title: Zesty lemon sponge cake
ingredients: ['175g butter or margarine', '175g caster sugar', '3 large eggs, beaten', '3-4 teaspoons lemon flavouring or essence, to taste', '1 lemon, zest only', '175g self-raising flour', '1 sachet lemon meringue pie filling such as GreensÂ®', '142ml double cream', '2 teaspoons icing sugar, plus extra for dusting']
